articles.author: Maggie Fox, CNN
articles.title: Coronavirus found in men's semen - CNN
articles.description: Coronavirus can be found in the semen of men infected with the virus, Chinese researchers reported in a study that raises the question of sexual transmission.
articles.content:
(CNN)The new coronavirus can persist in men's semen even after they have begun to recover, a finding that raises the possibility the virus could be sexually transmitted, Chinese researchers said Thursday.
A team at Shangqiu Municipal Hospital tested 38 male … [+1720 chars]

articles.title: Delhi: Malaria, dengue cases creeping up - The Indian Express
articles.description: The South, North and East civic bodies have prepared a roadmap of activities — fogging and awareness drives — to be carried out in the coming days.

articles.title: WHO Chief Scientist Commends India For Keeping COVID-19 Cases Low - Odisha Television Ltd.
articles.description: World Health Organisation's Chief Scientist Soumya Swaminathan on Monday commended India for keeping the coronavirus cases and deaths very low compared to other countries and said it will play an important role in the development of a vaccine for COVID-19.
